channel.title: ERROR I've tried everything I can think of =(
channel.description:

^ client.java:1897: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1901: class, interface, or enum expected case 356: ^ client.java:1906: class, interface, or enum expected newclue(cluestage); ^ client.java:1907: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1911: class, interface, or enum expected case 357: ^ client.java:1916: class, interface, or enum expected newclue(cluestage); ^ client.java:1917: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1921: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1926: class, interface, or enum expected public void objectClick3(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY) { ^ client.java:1931: class, interface, or enum expected switch (objectID) { ^ client.java:1934: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:1936: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1941: class, interface, or enum expected public int teleReq = 0; ^ client.java:1942: class, interface, or enum expected public String teleLoc = ""; ^ client.java:1943: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean teleOtherScreen = false; ^ client.java:1945: class, interface, or enum expected public void teleOtherRequest(String teleLocation, int player) { ^ client.java:1949: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest(telePlayer, 12558); ^ client.java:1950: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest(teleLocation, 12560); ^ client.java:1951: class, interface, or enum expected showInterface(12468); ^ client.java:1953: class, interface, or enum expected teleReq = player; ^ client.java:1954: class, interface, or enum expected teleLoc = teleLocation; ^ client.java:1956: class, interface, or enum expected teleOtherScreen = true; ^ client.java:1958: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1962: class, interface, or enum expected public int getSummonXPForLevel(int level) { ^ client.java:1964: class, interface, or enum expected int output = 0; ^ client.java:1966: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:1966: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:1966: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:1968: class, interface, or enum expected if (lvl >= level) { ^ client.java:1970: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1972: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1974: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1976: class, interface, or enum expected public int getSummonLvlForXP(int exp) { ^ client.java:1978: class, interface, or enum expected int output = 0; ^ client.java:1980: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 250; lvl++) { ^ client.java:1980: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 250; lvl++) { ^ client.java:1980: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 250; lvl++) { ^ client.java:1982: class, interface, or enum expected output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); ^ client.java:1983: class, interface, or enum expected if (output >= exp) { ^ client.java:1985: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1988: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:1990: class, interface, or enum expected public void addSummonXP(int amount) { ^ client.java:1992: class, interface, or enum expected summonXP += amount; ^ client.java:1993: class, interface, or enum expected RefreshSummonBook(); ^ client.java:1994: class, interface, or enum expected if (oldLevel < getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP)) { ^ client.java:1996: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("Congratulations you have advanced a Summon level"); ^ client.java:1997: class, interface, or enum expected RefreshSummonBook(); ^ client.java:1998: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:1999: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2000: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2003: class, interface, or enum expected public void SummonNewNPC(int npcID) { ^ client.java:2005: class, interface, or enum expected summonedNPCS++; ^ client.java:2006: class, interface, or enum expected actionTimer = 20; ^ client.java:2007: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2009: class, interface, or enum expected public void SummonNPC(int NPCID) { // Xerozcheez: All the summoning spells are ere! ^ client.java:2013: class, interface, or enum expected if(summonedNPCS == maxSummoned && summonLevel >= 10) { ^ client.java:2015: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2022: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(385, absY-1, absX); ^ client.java:2023: class, interface, or enum expected SummonNewNPC(NPCID); ^ client.java:2024: class, interface, or enum expected addSummonXP(25); ^ client.java:2025: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("What the hell man where'd that come from!!! You summon a goblin!")
^ client.java:2026: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2029: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2032: class, interface, or enum expected case 1655: // Crawling hand (level 5) ^ client.java:2036: class, interface, or enum expected deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 10); ^ client.java:2037: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(84, absY-1, absX); ^ client.java:2038: class, interface, or enum expected SummonNewNPC(NPCID); ^ client.java:2039: class, interface, or enum expected addSummonXP(50); ^ client.java:2040: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("You summon a crawling hand."); ^ client.java:2041: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2044: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2048: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2051: class, interface, or enum expected case 77: // Zombie (level 10) ^ client.java:2055: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX); ^ client.java:2056: class, interface, or enum expected SummonNewNPC(NPCID); ^ client.java:2057: class, interface, or enum expected addSummonXP(75); ^ client.java:2058: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("From the grave-a zombie appears!"); ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
theres my error. I (luckily) had a copy...however lost alot of stuff i edited because of this. It would be great if 1 of you guys could figure this out. i copied from the good file from where the error messege starts all the way down to where it ends at the 'from the grave a zombie appears' and pasted onto the bad one to replace and still got 100 errors. please help :confused:

item.title: ERROR I've tried everything I can think of =(
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

That means that you added an extra closing bracket where it wasn’t needed, kicking out a void or something from the CLASS. If you have a good java program (not notepad ><), find the line where the error is occuring and look for an extra bracket }. If you have notepad, DANG.

Read full topic
item.source: ERROR I've tried everything I can think of =(
